bibl.title: An Ostracon from Alexandria.
bibl.note: Memorandum made by someone who had to pay for two different deliveries: one of wine and another. Alexandria, Roman period.

bibl.title: 50 Years of Polish Excavations in Egypt and the Near East. Acts of the Symposium at the Warsaw University 1986

bibl.seg: LUKASZEWICZ Adam, An Ostracon from Alexandria.
50 Years of Polish Excavations in Egypt and the Near East. Acts of the Symposium at the Warsaw University 1986 (Varsovie, 1992) pp. 215-216.
Memorandum made by someone who had to pay for two different deliveries: one of wine and another. Alexandria, Roman period.
